quote: The whole history of the world is summed up in the fact that, when nations are strong, they are not always just, and when they wish to be just, they are no longer strong.

quote: My most brilliant achievement was my ability to be able to persuade my wife to marry me.

quote: What is adequacy? Adequacy is no standard at all.

quote: It is wonderful what great strides can be made when there is a resolute purpose behind them.

quote: We shall show mercy, but we shall not ask for it.
